column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The free visitor guide points out the most famous paintings in the museum with which most people are familiar
column2: def use that as a guide for what to see. I absolutely LOVED the Leichtenstein exhibit. I've seen some of this work in media before
column3: but it was amazing to see in person. Throw in some Picasso
column5: and many other famous paintings (American Gothic
column7: and it's a great place to spend an afternoon.
